member.name: M:HealthGateway.Immunization.Controllers.ImmunizationController.GetImmunizations(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a json list of immunization records.
member.response: Returns the List of Immunization records.
The client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.
The client does not have access rights to the content; that is, it is unauthorized, so the server is refusing to give the requested resource. Unlike 401, the client's identity is known to the server.
The service is unavailable for use.

member.name: T:HealthGateway.Immunization.Delegates.IImmunizationDelegate
member.summary: Interface that defines a delegate to retrieve immunization information.

member.name: M:HealthGateway.Immunization.Delegates.IImmunizationDelegate.GetImmunizations(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a PHSA Result including the load state and a List of Immunizations for the authenticated user. It has a collection of one or more Immunizations.
member.param: The security token representing the authenticated user.
member.returns: The PHSAResult including the load state and the list of Immunizations available for the user identified by the bearerToken.
